column6: FEAR ITSELF TIE-IN! In the midst of FEAR ITSELF, anything goes! Just as the unlikely team of Namor, Dr. Strange, the Silver Surfer, the Savage She-Hulk, and Loa band together, they're torn apart by a nightmare from the depths. And now each of these heroes must face an almost unstoppable enemy--and crushing fear--alone!
column7: | Doctor Strange | Silver Surfer | Sub-Mariner | Tiger Shark
